mapper.select: SELECT s.str_name, r.rsv_no, r.rsv_day FROM `reservation` r INNER JOIN `store` s ON r.str_number = s.str_number WHERE r.rsv_no=#{rsv_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `rsv_comment` (rsv_cmt_content, rsv_cmt_point, rsv_cmt_date, rsv_no) VALUES(#{rsv_cmt_content}, #{rsv_cmt_point}, NOW(), #{rsv_no})
